name: Social Randos
description:
Please enjoy this never-ending stream of imaginary people. You can click on hearts to give good posts a like, but it doesn't do anything as of yet (except make those newly spawned people feel mighty good about themselves, I'd imagine).

I have it speeding up as a test - I may change this to just be chill af though, there's something engrossing about reading about Lady the Impaler's "my face right now" posts.
